website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Threadborne Blur is a neutral running road shoe that many were impressed by because of its versatile design. Reviewers were able to use the shoe in activities other than running – working out, walking in the park, etc. Runners, on the other hand, felt that they worked best when used for short runs or tempo workouts. However, a few users hinted that the quality might not be that good. Nevertheless, the shoe still proved to be a good option for those searching for a reliable running shoe that can double as a lifestyle sneaker.
pros: Most users praised the shoe for being comfortable
Plenty of testers were able to use their pair for different activities, not just running
Some runners mentioned that the upper material felt light and airy
A few reviewers expressed that the Under Armour Threadborne Blur was suitable for short and fast runs, or speed workouts
A small number of users commended the responsiveness of the cushioning
Some testers thought that the shoe was of good value for money
Most agreed that the measurement is true to size
Plenty of reviewers said that there was enough room in the toe box
cons: One reviewer mentioned that the material the tongue was made out of felt like a wrinkled piece of paper
A few users complained that they had to pry small pebbles from the gaps in between the wavy indentions on the outsole
One runner noticed that the outsole was beginning to peel off after using the shoe for only two weeks
A good number of runners felt like the support the shoe delivered wasn’t enough for long distance running
One reviewer experienced blistering on the bottom of his Achilles heel because the notch touching this part was firmer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour run smaller than Nike
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Nike sports shoes. Since they decided social issues are more important than selling shoes I decided to try Under Armour. 1st time have a bought Under Armour shoes. These are very cool but did not fit my size 11 foot. Had to send them back. Also found that the shoe material is "see thru" for ventilation. You can see your socks thru the shoe. Did not care for that. I need them for some winter warmth so a bought a different style Under Armour. The new pair fit good in size 11.5 and I will give them a 5 star review when reviewing them..
customer_reviews.author: Clint Westwood

customer_reviews.title: I love the look with joggers
customer_reviews.text: i bought these more for looks than performance but I worked legs today in them and had absolutely no problems! I love the look with joggers!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really light shoes. This item has mixed reviews. Personally these are good shoes. They are light, comfortable and they fit perfect. However these shoes are not meant for running. The insert on this shoes is very thin. You don’t have much foot support. If you were to go running on concrete your feet will be hurting you after. You can easily purchase a shoe insert and solve this problem. The material on this shoe is not meant to be put though rough paths, as the material on this shoe can easily rip.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely comfortable and fits around my foot nicely
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely comfortable and fits around my foot nicely. The laces are slightly elastic so it doesn't ever feel like my laces are too tight or too loose. The only concern that I have is the larger whole in the sole. I often find myself on gravel roads and from time to time a rock just gets stuck in there and I have to stop to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Judkins

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I always purchase my running shoes a half size smaller than my regular shoe size, mainly because I like them to fit snug and I don't run with socks (#nojudgementzone). I now realize, however, I should have ordered these true to size. This is weird because I've purchased UA before and I don't ever remember getting them true to size. Anyways, I received the order really fast and the shoe looked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ArReon Watson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Kicks
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Ultra comfortable, light and stylish. I own multiple pairs is different colors. I use them as gym sneakers and can’t speak to running with them.
customer_reviews.author: HoopOfficial

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe but order half a size bigger. Super light and durable. One of the best running shoes from under armour. Probably ran over 200 miles in these shoes and probably and another 100 to go them before the sole gives out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all scenerios
customer_reviews.text: I love under armour gloves and the main application I use to use them for was for bouncing. I loved tossing people out of the club and with under armour it made me ready. I recently use these gloves for cutting a tree down and cutting it into little pieces. But the best so far is for target practice and rifle drills. Gets in there tight and makes it for a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these shoes at first because of the material but after receiving them and wearing them around town I have to say they are great. They fit exactly as expected. The material feels so lightweight almost as if nothing is on your feet which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great, but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, purchased as a gift and recipient loves them. Only issue I’ve had with this brand is the inside sole has broken outside the cloth seam. This has happened on multiple pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Leg thumbs hurts
customer_reviews.text: My leg thumb huts I have walk a lot but Wore it for nine hours and walk 1843 steps “I think they need to work with the shoes design” I ware New balance,Nike,Adidas if same size it’s good fit good my friend said that but Under armour is not good and it’s true. “Its not to the maker”
customer_reviews.author: osbert

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this model of UA shoes I have owned and find them very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: George Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great And so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and really worth it great look and so so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Fadhil & Mudher Fadhel

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: It was a great color for my brown and tan pants
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he rarely takes them off. Light, comfortable, fit as expected. Best price I’ve seen online.
customer_reviews.author: LBP

customer_reviews.title: Under Armor
customer_reviews.text: Not a very substantial shoe for the cost. Looks good though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Not as light as some shoes, but feel great. These are my favorite pair for 3-5 mile runs now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe for walking, it fits very well, good looking & comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Knight

customer_reviews.title: Still love them and wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Right shoe is a tiny bit smaller than the left. Still love them and wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Liverman

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes go good with any outfit, only issue I have is the back of the shoe rubs and irritates if you wear no show socks
customer_reviews.author: Jay Payne

customer_reviews.title: probably perfect if you aren't size ginormous
customer_reviews.text: A little snug if you're fat and have flat feet, probably perfect if you aren't size ginormous. Look spectacular though.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Abbatecola

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the shoe fit but the color is hot pink not orange.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Ballers
customer_reviews.text: This is like Converse and Nike mated and these popped out 9 months later. Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cody Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stylish shoe, but extremely uncomfortable for my 12-hour shifts in a hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Gets dirty quickly
customer_reviews.text: The white front part gets dirty quickly, but great design at the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Austin Melnek

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are tight and very flimsy. Do not buy if you look for support in your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FrostyOne

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe but feels like cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I felt as soon as I’d tighten it the thread would rip. Very light shoe but feels like cheap material
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice and very comfortable. I use them for everyday life in summer and not only for sport
customer_reviews.author: alberto benedusi

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up very long
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my son the beginning of the school year, which he didn't start wearing this until September 4th. He only wears this for school, comes home and takes them off. In less than 3 months this is what they look like. I know have to buy him another pair. Not made good. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

product_meta.title: Under Armour Threadborne Blur Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Under Armour Threadborne Blur Running Shoes Designed for speed, the Under Armour Threadborne Blur running shoe features an array of technologies to help you maximise both focus and performance. Threadborne Knit Upper The Threadborne knit upper proves a breathable, compression-like fit to deliver lightweight, directional strength to assist your performance. This helps the shoe to mould to your foot for extra comfort and support without feeling restricting or tight. Working alongside the Threadborne knit is signature Under Armour SpeedForm construction, which ensures a precision fit to minimise distraction and discomfort. Breathable mesh actively and efficiently wicks away the build-up of excess sweat and moisture, leaving your feet cool, dry and comfortable as you strive for the best results and performance. Additionally, cool air is encouraged to circulate, creating a drier, healthier environment for your feet to thrive. The tongue is attached to the footbed by stretchable support wings to increase support whilst maintaining a snug fit throughout the foot. Traditional lacing offers a secure, locked-in feel for your feet while the embedded sockliner sits comfortably against the skin for added cushioning and seamless comfort. Lightweight One-Piece Midsole The lightweight, one-piece midsole is made from a foam compound to deliver an extremely responsive ride and provide ample cushioning to improve comfort. Also, the midsole lessens the impact placed on the knees and joints by attenuating shock to reduce the potential risk of injury or discomfort. As the midsole is exceptionally light, you will be able to move with freedom without being restricted or held back by the shoe, ensuring optimum performance time and time again. Blown Rubber Outsole Blown rubber comprises the outsole for durability, grip and traction. This helps to deliver a firm, assured footing and total confidence knowing you have a shoe in which you can truly rely upon. The blown rubber is lig
feature_bullets: Threadborne Knit Upper - Provides a breathable, compression-like fit.
Lightweight - Simple design and lightweight materials keep the weight down.
SpeedForm Construction - Ensures a precision fit.
Breathable Mesh - Provides breathability throughout the upper.
Moisture Management - Wicks away excess sweat and moisture.
